Text: is this supposed to be self boot? if not then what boot disc should i use, because utopia 1.1 didn't work with it.

Get the utopia boot disc.  It's free.  Just find it on the internets.
all CDI images are by default self boot, or at least they should be.

This doesn't require a boot-disc. I used DiscJuggler & it works fine on my DC. REMEMBER TO SEED. I am seeding until 4/20. Keep the DC alive by sharing with your fellow gamer.
